meanings.definition: Summarizes the main points of something
meanings.sent1: The recaps of the story helped me understand it better.
meanings.sent2: I always read the recaps of books before exams.
meanings.sent3: The recaps of the meeting were so detailed, they made me laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her recaps of the game were like a painting, capturing every detail.
meanings.sent5: The recaps of the lesson made it easier to remember.

meanings.definition: A brief summary of a previously aired television show or movie.
meanings.sent1: The recaps of the show reminded me of the best parts.
meanings.sent2: I missed the movie, so I read the recaps online.
meanings.sent3: The recaps of the series were so funny, they made me smile.
meanings.sent4: His recaps of the film were like a trailer, giving a glimpse of the plot.
meanings.sent5: The recaps of the episode made me want to watch it again.
